alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jewell, northern Smith, southeastern Franklin and southwestern Webster Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Athol, or 23 miles east of Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Smith Center around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Inavale and Red Cloud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas...and south central Nebraska.
